sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

body_weight.Description: weight of the participant measured the day of the scan

body_height.Description: height of the participant as reported by the participant

hematocrit.Description: Hematocrit of the participant measured before the scan normalized between 0 and 1. When not measured, set to literature recommended value, 0.4 for female and 0.45 for male participants (REF:https://medlineplus.gov/ency/article/003646.htm)

glucose_concentration.Description: Glucose concentration of the participant measured before the scan
